thread.section_title: Biblio.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Biblio.com | www.biblio.com | 3 of 101
thread.title: Dale Redfairn

author: Dale Redfairn
title: Dale Redfairn
text: I would never buy books any other way since I've discovered biblio.com. You can select the price you want and the quality you want. The books I've purchased were always the quality promised and delivery has always been prompt. And many sellers offer free shipping. I don't see any reason to travel to big box bookstores anymore nor pay the prices Amazon charges.
